title: 4 YEARS since he had a skin
body: You are giving Teemo another skin but Zilean hasn't had a new skin in **4 years** (you cant even buy that one). So technically he hasnt had one in 5 years. So I ask you Riot, where is my Zilean skin?

replies.body: We also thought Zilean has been waiting long enough for a new skin. Youuu should totally check out what's hitting the PBE!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mEd9akll,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-04-08T00:37:41.287+0000)
>
> We also thought Zilean has been waiting long enough for a new skin. Youuu should totally check out what's hitting the PBE!

...Katey, have I ever told you how much I love you (and the rest of the Skin Team of course, tis' an expression of endearment rather than courtship)?

Give my thanks if you would, though at this point I could probably write a novel with the praise I've given you guys :P

Imo (not a Zilean player, but from an artistic standpoint) the people who worked on this did a great job with it. About time Zilean got a dark themed skin, and hey this clears the myth of "5 skins per line)

Where's one for Lux? WHY ARE YOU IGNORING HER?

She's even dead last place for Texture Rebalance.

Lux is fine visually. Skins? Not something I can comment on. For Lux at least.

Zilean visually though? My god man. He has rectangle feet. Meddler also said at Pax East that Zilean won't be getting a visual rework in ages.

Thats because her model doesn't look all that bad, unlike Poppy who looks like a dogturd with ponytails. Shes actually in need for a visual update, Lux herself could be removed from the list considering her model actually isn't that dated.
:/ the colour palette looks so similar to Shurima Desert Zilean, with all that red. :/

Here I will save you the trouble:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=04YzfHwx0P0

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mEd9akll,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-04-08T00:37:41.287+0000)
>
> We also thought Zilean has been waiting long enough for a new skin. Youuu should totally check out what's hitting the PBE!

And OMG Ziggs. Does he throw books like Robin in Smash Bros? :O

Edit: Oh the money I would spend right now Rito if I got to play league more than a few times every 2 or 3 months T^T (CURSE YOU HUGHES NET)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mEd9akll,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-04-08T00:37:41.287+0000)
>
> We also thought Zilean has been waiting long enough for a new skin. Youuu should totally check out what's hitting the PBE!

Is Lux ever getting that girly skin that she was supposed to get in 2014?

Blood Moon Zilean.  Doesn't feel worth a 4-year wait, honestly.

It feels like a "let's release something so they shut up about it."

Make it a Paramotor skin.

One of these things: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:WikipediaParamotor.jpg
Let be honest all of zils skins were realsed at the same time. Just different periods of history. they will always be new and old at the same time
a track coach skin... give your speed  buff with a chance to try again.
